item.description:
We can have a late breakfast or early lunch. Depending on if you're in a Mooney or Cub! There is a restaurant at the airport or we buzz into town. If the wx is good, we might want to extend our stay for the afternoon.
Most of us have room for extra's so, bring a friend....

http://www.blockislan...
http://www.airnav.com...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the terminal and try to get Wheel's Off The Ground by 9:00.
item.why: Let's give this a try, we have plenty of pilots and planes!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: block Island FPA Fly Out
